name: Battlehammer Dwarf
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Dwarven Resilience: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.
traits.Keen Hearing and Sight: The dwarf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.Multiattack: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.
actions.Handaxe: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6 + 0) piercing damage.
actions.Light Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
